value.title: Azure Friday | Azure IoT Hub
value.excerpt: Olivier Bloch joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure IoT and how it is more than just about connecting IoT devices and sending telemetry to the Cloud. They also talk about Azure IoT device topics such as twins, provisioning, and lifecycle management.  For more information, see:  Azure IoT Hub - http://aka.ms/azureiotgetstarted

value.title: Azure Friday | Serverless APIs with Azure Function Proxies
value.excerpt: Alex Karcher joins Donovan Brown to discuss Azure Function Proxies, the serverless API toolbox. Proxies give you a truly serverless experience to manage your APIs with dynamic billing and scaling, and a super simple setup process.  For more information, see:  Azure Functions Proxies is now Generally

value.title: Azure is the new mainframe | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Steve Steuart from Astadia joins Scott Hanselman to show how a mainframe reference architecture based on Azure enables you to deploy your mainframe assets to a native Azure environment. You can the leverage all the available Azure services with your new mainframe in the cloud, including AI, Power BI,

value.title: Cloud security with Rob Polly
value.excerpt: A ten-part miniseries recounting the Microsoft journey to the cloud—told by the pioneers who took us there. value.title: Common design patterns with Azure Cosmos DB | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Aravind Krishna stops by to chat with Scott Hanselman and take a look at common design patterns for building highly scalable solutions with Azure Cosmos DB. value.title: Deploy your Web App in Windows Containers on Azure App Service | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Windows Container support is available in preview in Azure App Service. value.title: Enabling secure remote work using Windows Virtual Desktop | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Windows Virtual Desktop (WVD) is a comprehensive desktop and app virtualization service running in Azure to enable secure remote work. Christiaan Brinkhoff joins Scott Hanselman to show how WVD is different from other desktop virtualization technologies, as well as how easy it is to implement and maintain.

value.title: Getting started with Azure App Configuration | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure App Configuration is a service that enables you to centralize your application configuration. You can use Azure App Configuration to store and retrieve settings for applications,

value.title: How the Azure Cloud Shell uses storage | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, we'll demystify storage in the Azure Cloud Shell.
